text: @GovRicketts What the hell is wrong with you? The American people have a right to know how many coronavirus cases there are in meat packing plants. We're the ones eating that shit!!!!!! #COVID19 #coronavirus #GOPDeathCult #GOPCorruptionOverCountry #NebraskaContaminatedMeat
